channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: The Light That Lies
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (Petersen Marzoni)
item.description: Robert Emmet Long was in a hurry. He didn't like driving at night, particularly through the Bayfield cutoff. About half a mile from the main highway his lights blinked twice, then went out. That was the signal that Convict 1836 was waiting for ... or so he thought!
